messages.title: Github Stalker
messages.subtitle: The best stalker for Github in the world. Stalk or be stalked :)

buttons.postback: What do you know about vidimitrov?

speech: Yo stalker here! A Github Stalker. Ask me a question like "What do you know about vidimitrov?", "How many repositories does vidimitrov have?", "Is vidimitrov a good developer?". After that, you can continue with questions like: "What are his/her primary programming language?" or "How many open-source repositories he contributed to?"

Hello! I am a stalker, a Github Stalker! Basically, I stalk open-source contributors. Ask me a question like "What do you know about vidimitrov?", "How many repositories does vidimitrov have?", "Is vidimitrov a good developer?". After that, you can continue with questions like: "What are his/her primary programming language?" or "How many open-source repositories he contributed to?"

Hi, nice to meet you. I am Stalker, Github Stalker. Ask me a question like "What do you know about vidimitrov?", "How many repositories does vidimitrov have?", "Is vidimitrov a good developer?". After that, you can continue with questions like: "What are his/her primary programming language?" or "How many open-source repositories he contributed to?"
